title: Expert Course in Learning Design Using Educational Modeling Language

context.prior_knowledge: Basic grasp of instructional design concepts and LMS (Learning Management System) usage experience
context.additional_context: The need for corporate language program managers/leaders to strengthen EML-based learning design competencies

learning_goals: Learners can model language learning units (courses/lessons) using IMS Learning Design (EML).
Learners can create instructional design documents reflecting the structure, roles, and environments of learning activities.
Learners can design LMS-integrated educational models and execute validation processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
